text: On proizvodit sady vinogradnykh loz, rastushchikh na podporakh i rastushchikh bez podpor; - pal'movyye dereva i khlebnyye posevy, ot kotorykh snedi razlichny; - masliny i granaty, pokhozhiye i nepokhozhiye odni na drugikh: yesh'te plody s nikh, kogda On oplodotvorit ikh, i vo dni zhatvy ikh sobirayte ikh, skol' potrebno; no ne bud'te neumerenny, potomu, chto On ne lyubit neumerennykh
